# cloudflare_secondary_dns_tsig (Resource)




<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account_id` (String)
- `algo` (String) TSIG algorithm.
- `name` (String) TSIG key name.
- `secret` (String) TSIG secret.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
